settings.text: Hello, I'm Matt Holland, the founder of DIY Building Supplies. With a genuine passion for the construction industry, I wanted to create a company that puts people first. Our mission is simple: to provide you with the best quality materials at affordable prices.

settings.heading: Benefit from value, quality and ease of delivery.

settings.text:
We founded DIY Building Supplies because we wanted to bring better service to the world of building material supplies and DIY building materials. All too often, we found contractors were not receiving the high-quality materials and dedicated service they needed for their projects.

And DIYers often struggle with that same lack of service when sourcing the right materials for what they need. We believe everyone should have access to the best materials at the best price.

settings.heading: We know our products inside and out.

settings.text:
Whether working with passionate DIYers or using our trade contacts to secure the best products for contractors and construction companies, our service is always the same: personalised, efficient and guided by great prices.

We work hard to source and select top quality building supplies so you have everything you need to take a project from start to finish. Combine that with our excellent industry connections and you can trust that you are getting quality.

settings.title: Customer-centric approach
settings.text: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We strive to understand their needs and exceed their expectations by providing excellent service, quality products, and expert advice.

settings.title: Commitment to quality
settings.text:
We are dedicated to delivering building supplies of the utmost quality, sourced from trusted manufacturers and suppliers. We believe that high-quality products are essential for successful DIY
projects and customer satisfaction.

settings.title: Flexibility in working
settings.text: We value our staff and recognise the importance of work-life balance. We promote flexible working arrangements that enable our employees to adapt their schedules to meet their personal needs while still ensuring exceptional service to our customers.

settings.title: Continuous improvement
settings.text: We are committed to continuously improving our processes, product range, and customer experience. We encourage innovation, embrace new technologies, and actively seek feedback from our customers and staff to drive ongoing improvement.

settings.title: Teamwork and collaboration
settings.text: We foster a collaborative work environment where mutual respect, open communication, and teamwork are valued. We believe that by working together, supporting each other, and leveraging the diverse skills and expertise of our staff, we can achieve the best outcomes for our customers and our company.

settings.title: Supplier Relationships
settings.text: We are committed to creating positive working relationships with our supply chain which enables us to deliver an exceptional customer experience and competitive pricing.

settings.title: Account manager
settings.text: When you work with DIY Building Supplies, you benefit from the perfect combination of professionalism and personal treatment, plus insider knowledge that only comes with years of experience in the industry.

settings.title: One stop shop
settings.text: We created our site so it’s easy to find exactly what you’re looking for. We even offer next day delivery upon request. You save time and money and enjoy a seamless ordering experience.

settings.title: Free Delivery Over £350
settings.text: Have your building material supplies delivered nationwide in as little as three days with free delivery when you spend over £350 ex VAT

Through my years of experience and industry connections, we have built a network that allows us to source premium materials without the hefty price tag. We believe that everyone should have access to top-notch supplies without compromising on quality. At DIY Building Supplies, we strive to be your trusted partner on your construction journey. We understand the challenges you face and the importance of honest guidance.

Our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way, offering personalised support and sharing insights from our own experiences. We take pride in building lasting relationships with our customers, and we're committed to delivering exceptional value. By working with us, you can trust that you're getting the best materials at the best prices, backed by our honest and human approach. Thank you for choosing DIY Building Supplies. We look forward to being a part of your building projects and helping you turn your vision into reality.

Matt Holland

Founder, DIY Building Supplies
